title: Cigar of the Year Contenders & Eric Hanson from Hammer + Sickle
itunes:title: Cigar of the Year Contenders & Eric Hanson from Hammer + Sickle
description:
It's that time of the year, where The Cigar Authority announces the contenders of Cigar of the Year. On hand was the reigning champion, Erich Hanson brand owner for Hammer + Sickle. His cigar Icon, held the title for 2013. Tune in to find out wha the contenders for 2014 are....
All that and the usual shenanigans that is The Cigar Authority.
